tool_description: Facebook Graph API.  (For demo purposes only).  You can also use FQL using the "fql" parameter.  You need to create an app in https://developers.facebook.com/apps to get this to work (check the Readme section)
name: Facebook Graph
title: Facebook Graph

api_list.name: Friends
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mashape-community-facebook-graph.p.rapidapi.com/me/friends"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mashape-community-facebook-graph.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mashape-community-facebook-graph.p.rapidapi.com/me"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mashape-community-facebook-graph.p.rapidapi.com"

api_list.name: fql

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.default: select uid, message from status where uid in (select uid2 from friend where uid1=me())
